name: ireceipt
description: Generate Taiwan's electronic receipt including the layout and XML for National Taxation Bureau

scripts.build:dev: node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir dist && npm run css-compile
scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir dist --minified && npm run css-compile && npm run css-minify
scripts.css-compile: node_modules/.bin/node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --output dist/css src/scss

author: Zheng-Xiang Ke
